- Fixed underground freeze bug
- Reduced box open animation time
- Missile sound bug fix
- When clearing the end of each chapter multiple times, it does not advance to the next chapter.
- Fix the camera closer to me when the boss appears
- Fixed a bug where the health penalty did not work
- Echo City's enemy's attack power decreased
- Fixed a bug where advertisement in the supply box did not appear
- Item piece purchase system added
- Coins given by cats in town are temporarily deleted (due to performance problems)

- Fixed underground freeze bug
- Reduced box open animation time
- Missile sound bug fix
- When clearing the end of each chapter multiple times, it does not advance to the next chapter.
- Fix the camera closer to me when the boss appears
- Fixed a bug where the health penalty did not work
- Echo City's enemy's attack power decreased
- Fixed a bug where advertisement in the supply box did not appear
- Item piece purchase system added
- Coins given by cats in town are temporarily deleted (due to performance problems)

- Supply box error correction
- Optimization (box open, UI, etc.)
- Sound error correction
- Double Jam Bonus is applied to individual products on the first purchase
- Change controller to analog stick
